properties.displayName: Abuse of Service Permissions to Hide Services Via Set-Service
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-SecurityDescriptorSddl " or ProcessCommandLine contains "-sd ") and (FolderPath endswith "\\pwsh.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "pwsh.dll") and (ProcessCommandLine contains "Set-Service " and ProcessCommandLine contains "DCLCWPDTSD")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of the "Set-Service" powershell cmdlet to configure a new SecurityDescriptor that allows a service to be hidden from other utilities such as "sc.exe", "Get-Service"...etc. (Works only in powershell 7)
